TEXT.French: Fondée par le premier à découvrir
TEXT.Italian: Fondato dalla prima civilità che scopre

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Free %s1_promotion for new units belonging to available category in the city

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Be upgraded automatically depending on the amount of Empire Treasury per City.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]000-049 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_UNHAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]050-099 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]100-149 [ICON_GOLD] per City: None[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]150-199 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +1 [ICON_HAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]200-299 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_HAPPY], +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]300-499 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_HAPPY], +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]500over [ICON_GOLD] per City: +3 [ICON_HAPPY], +40% [ICON_PRODUCTION], +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
